pr_title: Lwan: Address performance issues with the cached queries benchmark

timeline.bodyText:
hey @lpereira I've missed this in the past but for the query tests, we're looking for both randomNumber and id to be read from the db.

i. For every request, a single row from a World table must be retrieved from a database table. It is not acceptable to read just the randomNumber.
timeline.author: nbrady-techempower

replies.bodyText: Fair.  Rebased and made a commit making this change.
replies.author: lpereira

timeline.message:
